name: Cleaning Boss Frenzy
description:
The maid is tired of cleaning up your mess and she's not taking it anymore!! She's taking drastic measures to clean the house, including blowing up anything that's dirty!

Cleaning Boss Frenzy is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages.

How far can you go? How many coins can you collect along the way? Collect those power-ups to help you out even more!

Collect enough coins and you can unlock other crazy characters for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect coins to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for everyone
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Cleaning Boss Frenzy right now while it's 100% FREE!
